CustomField.description: This field is a custom field that lets the user manually update the value. Once it was changed it will freeze and has to manually updated throughout the sales process.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Likelihood for winning the deal. Salesforce sets a % value based on current stage. User can override this value, but please note that the value has to be updated manually throughout the sales process once it was changed.
CustomField.label: Probability (%)
